name: Operator please.
description:
Global game jam 2017 hosted by the greater gaming society at Merge VR.

Art and ui - John Ledesma

Programming - Sarah richmond

Programming - Alicia baum

Music and audio - Jamail Chachere

Modeling - Ryan Tabatabai

-----------about the game-------------

You are an telephone switchboard operator and you are a tad bit bored, connect phone calls and ease-drop on conversations.
